hero.title: Websites made to stand out
hero.description: We design and create exclusive and optimized websites to enhance your digital business and go beyond conventional templates.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Choose the plan that fits your business goals and needs.
services.mod: All our services are customizable and adaptable.

landing.title: Landing Page
landing.description: Ideal for presenting your business actively and directly.

db.title: Database Manager
db.description: A solution to manage your information securely and efficiently.

whyus.title: Quality, Performance, and Exclusivity in Every Project
whyus.description: Forget generic templates and applications. We create unique websites with source code designed for your project.

features.f1: Our code is designed to be fast, efficient, and free of unnecessary elements. Unlike WordPress, every line is written specifically for your project, ensuring superior performance and a unique experience.
features.f2: We develop scalable web solutions tailored to your needs. Our code grows with you, adapting to any change or challenge, ensuring a durable and efficient product.
features.f3: We create premium websites that are fully customized and free from generic templates. Each project is designed to reflect exclusivity, quality, and the unique value of your brand.

plans.title: Support Plans
plans.description: Choose the plan based on your needs and let's start working together.

basic.description: Ideal if you already have a web server.

pro.description: Ideal if you have a web server but donâ€™t want complications.

premium.title: Premium

contact.title: Let's talk about your project
contact.description: Do you have an idea in mind? Fill out the form and we will contact you as soon as possible.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: At Hextech, we value your privacy. This document outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect your name, surname, email, and the message you wish to send us through the contact form.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: The collected data is used solely for communication regarding services, plans, or general inquiries. We do not share your data with third parties.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.content: Your data is stored in our email inbox on a private server. The server is password-protected and only accessible by the company's CEO.

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.content: Since we do not store data outside the email inbox, we do not offer data deletion or access options.

policyUpdates.title: Policy Updates
policyUpdates.content: Any updates to this policy will be communicated via email. Last updated on January 24, 2025.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.description: This legal notice regulates the use of the website hextech.joelarnaud.com, owned by Hextech.

ownership.title: Ownership
ownership.content: The website hextech.joelarnaud.com is operated by Hextech, a company based in Spain. Contact email: contact@joelarnaud.com.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.content: Hextech is not responsible for any misuse of the website or the information provided on it. Users are solely responsible for adhering to applicable laws.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website, including text, images, logos, and designs, is owned by Hextech and is protected under intellectual property laws. Unauthorized reproduction is prohibited.

userObligations.title: User Obligations
userObligations.content: Users agree not to engage in activities that could damage the website, its contents, or its functionality. Misuse may lead to legal actions.

applicableLaws.title: Applicable Laws
applicableLaws.content: This website operates under Spanish law. Any disputes will be resolved under the jurisdiction of Spanish courts.

e404.title: Page Not Found
e404.description: The page you are looking for does not exist
